mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SELL_ITEM_RESULT (ITEM_NUM, SELL_TYPE, SELLER_EMAIL, SELLER_PHONE, BUYER_EMAIL, BUYER_PHONE, ADDRESS, ITEM_SUB, ITEM_PRICE, SOLD_DATE) VALUES(#{itemNum}, #{sellType}, #{sellerEmail}, #{sellerPhone}, #{buyerEmail}, #{buyerPhone}, #{address}, #{itemSub}, #{itemPrice}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT R.*, I.ITEM_IMG_NAME AS ITEM_IMG_NAME FROM SELL_ITEM_RESULT R LEFT JOIN IMG I ON R.ITEM_NUM = I.ITEM_NUM WHERE BUYER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} ORDER BY SOLD_DATE DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT I.ITEM_CONTENTS, I.ITEM_NUM, I.ITEM_SUB, I.SELL_TYPE, I.SOLD_YN, I.ITEM_PRICE, I.SELL_STATE, R.SELLER_EMAIL, R.SELLER_PHONE, R.BUYER_EMAIL, R.BUYER_PHONE, R.ADDRESS, R.SOLD_DATE, G.ITEM_IMG_NAME AS ITEM_IMG_NAME FROM SELL_ITEM I LEFT JOIN SELL_ITEM_RESULT R ON I.ITEM_NUM = R.ITEM_NUM LEFT JOIN IMG G ON I.ITEM_NUM = G.ITEM_NUM WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} ORDER BY I.WRITE_DATE DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT R.*, I.ITEM_IMG_NAME AS ITEM_IMG_NAME FROM SELL_ITEM_RESULT R LEFT JOIN IMG I ON R.ITEM_NUM = I.ITEM_NUM WHERE BUYER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} ORDER BY SOLD_DATE DESC

SELECT I.ITEM_CONTENTS, I.ITEM_NUM, I.ITEM_SUB, I.SELL_TYPE, I.SOLD_YN, I.ITEM_PRICE, I.SELL_STATE, R.SELLER_EMAIL, R.SELLER_PHONE, R.BUYER_EMAIL, R.BUYER_PHONE, R.ADDRESS, R.SOLD_DATE, G.ITEM_IMG_NAME AS ITEM_IMG_NAME FROM SELL_ITEM I LEFT JOIN SELL_ITEM_RESULT R ON I.ITEM_NUM = R.ITEM_NUM LEFT JOIN IMG G ON I.ITEM_NUM = G.ITEM_NUM WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} ORDER BY I.WRITE_DATE DESC

SELECT SIR.ITEM_NUM, SIR.SOLD_DATE, SIR.ITEM_PRICE, SIR.SELLER_EMAIL, SI.ITEM_SUB, SI.ITEM_CONTENTS, SI.HIT_CNT, SI.ITEM_TYPE, SM.NICKNAME AS SELLER_NICKNAME, BM.NICKNAME AS BUYER_NICKNAME FROM SELL_ITEM_RESULT SIR LEFT JOIN MEMBER SM ON SIR.SELLER_EMAIL = SM.EMAIL LEFT JOIN MEMBER BM ON SIR.BUYER_EMAIL = BM.EMAIL LEFT JOIN SELL_ITEM SI ON SIR.ITEM_NUM = SI.ITEM_NUM WHERE SIR.ITEM_NUM = #{itemNum}
